title: Bug 17289: Combo box doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When attempting to click on the first Combo box, it does not take focus. It only takes focus when I drop down the combo list.
OB: The first Combo box in the application fails to take focus when clicked on. It only takes focus when the combo list is dropped down.
SR: To reproduce the issue, open the 'Add a new CVS Repository' dialog. Press the 'Tab' key and observe that the focus immediately goes to the second Combo box labeled 'Repository Path:'.
